question:
[Melissa] and her brother [Kenneth] went to see a movie. [Valerie], [Harry]'s sister, decided to go play outside in the sunshine. [Brittney], [Valerie]'s daughter decided to go, too. [Dale]'s daughter, [Danielle], made a dinner for her sister, [Frances]. [Melissa], who is the sister of [Morgan], is a lovely girl. [Ouida], who is the sister of [Frances], is a lovely girl. [Dale] and his uncle [Robert] went to the county fair and went on the ferris wheel [Kenneth] rushed to the hospital to find out that his wife and already given birth to a boy and had named him [Robert]. [Morgan] was happy to babysit her niece, [Brittney]. [Brittney] was a great child.
Question: How is [Ouida] related to [Harry]?
